options.content:
grafanactl


Command-line tool designed to simplify interaction with Grafana resources.


  • Manage, edit and create resources directly from the terminal

  • Integrate with automation

  • Works with static and programmatically generated resources

  • Iterate before deploying

Foundation SDK


A set of libraries for building and manipulating Grafana objects programmatically.


  • APIs in Go, TS, Java, Python and PHP

  • Built on top of Grafana provided schemas

#
#
# The pattern
#### A common pattern to express significant parts of the dashboard schema

#
#
# Layout and panels
#### Decoupling panel specification from layout models

#
#
# Panel structure
#### An improved syntax to build panels

#
#
# Queries and portable dashboards
#### A future-proof model for expressing queries and data source dependency
Unified structure
Untagled complexity
Mulitple layout support
Portable dashboard
App platform resource examples
